response.overview: Forced to settle his father's debt to the village lender and to support his mother and sister, Vijay turns to crime, joining a gang of smugglers to put food on the table and cash in his pockets. But when he meets beautiful Prema, Vijay begins to reconsider his chosen path and looks for a way to leave his felonious life behind. Helmed by P.D. Shenoy, the film stars Om Prakash, Babita and Sanjay Khan.
response.title: Sone Ke Haath
